item.title: The Source of My Social Sciences Hate
item.description: Recently I was reading a beautiful interview of Amartya Sen done by The Harvard Gazette. Back when I was in the ninth grade I was required to do a project for my Social Studies class. item.title: Book Review: Brief Interviews with Hideous Men
item.description: Brief Interviews with Hideous Men by David Foster Wallace My rating: 5 of 5 stars I enjoyed it, but it was a tough read. Unlike what the title might suggest this book is a collection of short stories. Some, but not all, of them are structured like interviews. Some, but not all, focus on a male character. Some, but not all, are about awful people. The vibe of the book is that it is a meditation on thinking.

item.title: Creating This Website Using Hugo on Windows 10
item.description: This post describes the creation process of this website. I have used the popular static site generator Hugo. Hugo is based on the language go. Disclaimer: this is the second time I am creating my website using Hugo. But the last time I created this was in 2015, so a lot has changed. Installing Hugo on Windows 10 My recommendation is to use Chocolatey to install Hugo although there are binaries available at github for direct installation.
